itemInfo.itemDesc: A dried swordfish obtained through Drying. It can be Crafted into a Trade Item at a Workbench.\nâ€» Drying decreases the value of the fish.

item.name: Swordfish
item.desc: An ingredient that can be sold to a Trader or used in Cooking. It can be obtained through Fishing.\n- Usage: Fried Fish, Steamed Fish, Fish Soup, etc.

item.name: Packaged Dried Swordfish
item.desc: A Trade Item containing 10 Dried Swordfish.
